Name: Pre-Hispanic City of Chichen-Itza
Description: Pre-Hispanic City of Chichen-Itza - UNESCO World Heritage Site. One of the most important Maya cities, featuring the iconic El Castillo pyramid and other impressive structures.

Name: Pre-Hispanic City of Teotihuacan
Description: Pre-Hispanic City of Teotihuacan - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ancient Mesoamerican city with the Pyramid of the Sun and Moon, one of the largest pre-Columbian cities.

Name: Pre-Hispanic City and National Park of Palenque
Description: Pre-Hispanic City and National Park of Palenque - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Maya city known for its well-preserved architecture and intricate stone carvings.

Name: Historic Centre of Mexico City and Xochimilco
Description: Historic Centre of Mexico City and Xochimilco - UNESCO World Heritage Site. The historic center with Aztec ruins and colonial architecture, plus the floating gardens of Xochimilco.

Name: Historic Town of Guanajuato and Adjacent Mines
Description: Historic Town of Guanajuato and Adjacent Mines - UNESCO World Heritage Site. A colonial mining town with beautiful Baroque architecture and underground tunnels.

Name: Historic Centre of Morelia
Description: Historic Centre of Morelia - UNESCO World Heritage Site. A well-preserved colonial city with over 200 historic buildings in pink stone.

Name: Historic Centre of Oaxaca and Archaeological Site of Monte Alb치n
Description: Historic Centre of Oaxaca and Archaeological Site of Monte Alb치n - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Colonial city and nearby Zapotec archaeological site with impressive pyramids.

Name: Sian Ka'an
Description: Sian Ka'an - UNESCO World Heritage Site. A biosphere reserve protecting tropical forests, mangroves, and marine areas with diverse wildlife.

Name: Whale Sanctuary of El Vizcaino
Description: Whale Sanctuary of El Vizcaino - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Important breeding and wintering site for gray whales, as well as other marine mammals.
